long_description: The portable Bushnell SolarBook 600 solar battery charger features an on-board, dual lithium ion battery and two USB outputs to keep multiple devices charged when you're on the go. Durable, flexible solar panels offer high solar collectivity, even in less than full sun conditions, and fold up into a compact and easy-to-pack protective case. You can pre-charge the high capacity Li Ion rechargeable battery at home from a wall outlet with the micro USB input for immediate power on demand. Two USB outputs let you charge a couple of devices at the same time. On-board lithium ion battery charges in approximately 6 hrs. in full sunlight or from a wall outlet; power gauge provides easy-to-read battery level indicator. Fully charged, the 5-volt, 1-amp battery can charge a camera up to 5 times, an MP3 player up to 3 times, a smartphone up to 2 times. The Bushnell SolarBook 600 solar battery charger can also provide a tablet with up to a half charge.
short_description: The portable Bushnell SolarBook 600 solar battery charger features an on-board, dual lithium ion battery and two USB outputs to keep multiple devices charged when you're on the go.
